text:
Looking for Patterns Among Exponents

Recall from the Number Connections unit that the values of ax for a given number a are called powers of a. In this problem we will explore patterns with powers of 2 and other whole numbers.

Copy and complete this table.

• Describe any patterns you see in the rows and columns. Explain why they are correct.
  • Give examples for your patterns.
  • Write a number sentence for each pattern.
